transcript:
Customer: Pichhe phir wapas karna.
Executive: This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Hello sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Oh.
Customer: Haan sir, kaise hain?
Executive: Ji badhiya boliye.
Customer: Sir, aapne bola tha na link share karo.
Executive: Abhi aapko main to bahar aa gaya.
Customer: Sir, aapne khud bola tha 3 baje ke baad.
Executive: To us baat ko do teen din ho gaye mam.
Customer: Sir, main lagatar call karti hu sir aapko.
Executive: Abhi to main bahar hua hu outstation hu.
Customer: To sir, aap aap ek kaam kariye na aap mera number note kar lijiye.
Executive: Konsa number? Kar sakte hain ya main?
Customer: Sir, ye bhi number hai ek mera personal number note kar lijiye.
Executive: Haan bataiye mere ko personal number.
Customer: 9898
Executive: Likho?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: 98
Customer: 101
Executive: 101
Customer: 255
Executive: 255
Customer: 85
Executive: 85?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Meenakshi.
Executive: Yes sir, Meenakshi Rai.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai? Aap mera ye number save kar lijiye aur aap mujhe isme jab bhi bhi aap wapas aaiyega, aap outstation se wapas kab aayenge?
Executive: Main around teen se char din lag jayenge mere ko.
Customer: Jab sir jab bhi aaiyega aap mujhe is number pe call kijiye ga, main aapko service ke related pura guide kar dungi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai? Abhi main filhal haan aur aise aap jab bhi bhi aapko 10-15 minute ka time milega na, ek baar aap app open karke khud se hi sari leads aap dekh lijiyega sir. Kyunki agar aap app open karke leads dekhenge na, to aap bahut easy define kiya hua aapko khud hi samajh mein aa jayega.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Hai na? To sir ye karna hai aapko aur dusra mujhe ye bataiye ki ye request main aapka close kar dijiye kyunki teen char din ho gaya sir aapse ho nahi paya. Aap jab wapas aayenge tab main aap mujhe call kar lijiyega. Main bhi aapko Saturday ka reminder laga leti hu Saturday tak aapko call kar lungi.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Bataiye sir.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai? To jab main isko close karungi na aapke paas se mera ek feedback jayega.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai? To aap apna please feedback share kijiye ga.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai? Thik hai sir, main Saturday ka reminder laga rahi hu aap mujhe ye bataiye Saturday ko mujhe agar aapko connect karna hai to kis time ka karna hai?
Executive: Same time.
Customer: Isi time pe na 3 baje ke baad? Haan thik hai. Thik hai haan. Aur thik hai sir aur kuch?
Executive: Nahi mam.
Customer: Sir main Saturday ko 3 baje ke baad ka reminder laga rahi hu. Saturday ko aap aa jaiye agar usse pehle aap aa gaye to usse pehle bhi aake aap mujhe call kar lijiyega. Main aapko video call pe ek ek cheez acche se explain karungi. Hai na? Ek ek cheez acche se explain karungi ki kya aapka hai. Thik hai? Kaise use karenge, kaise aapki relevancy increase hogi, kaise buyleads ka kya karenge ko zyada benefit hoga ye sari cheeze.
Customer: Thik hai? Bas sir please kar lijiyega main 100% support karne ke liye ready hu lekin aapko bhi matlab thoda sa mere sath aapko thoda sa time dena padega. Aap thoda sa time dijiye sir aapko khud difference pata chalega sir.
Executive: Hai na?
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thik hai? Iske alawa aapko aur koi cheez puchni hai? Aap aap ye bataiye sir employee rakhoge use karne ke liye kisi ko?
Executive: Mam network ki dikkat aa rahi hai main thik hai main aapko karta hu.
Customer: Thik hai sir, okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants executive to share the link.

- Customer wants to know how to use IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to call on Saturday.

- Executive will explain everything on video call.

- Executive will set a reminder for Saturday.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer on Saturday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, video call, reminder
